CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 18 reads: "6. Ernie Mores, Jack Allen, Faye Rubin, Sam MacCallum and Larry D. Berlin, all represented the Ace Furniture Company, showing electrical appliances"
TitMainTitle: Ernie Mores, Jack Allen, Faye Rubin, Sam MacCallum and Larry D. Berlin standing in Ace Furniture Company booth in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
